channel.title: Hariharan on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in Hariharan on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Aap Hamare Saath Nahi – Lyrics and Translation
item.description: Hariharan has an amazing voice and has performed in many movie songs both in Tamil and Hindi. But he also made his name in ghazal albums.

item.title: Nila Kaigirathu – Lyrics and Translation
item.description: This song has two versions. One sung by a little girl and the other by an adult male voice(Hariharan). It is melodious and beautiful. They have some variations in lyrics so I have chosen to translate the one by the child.
